attributes.action: We want our Roads open stop the Restrictions and the penalising of Drivers
attributes.additional_details: Everything from Business, Home life, is being affected People are spending more time Getting to work and Home from Work Buildings are going to fall into disrepair because they can’t be maintained due to road closures and narrowing of lanes on main roads small firms are Struggling as the prices have to go up to cover the time getting to and from jobs the restrictions on parking or even getting into roads The Emergency Services are struggling to respond to calls in a meaningful time what is it going to take 1 death or a thousand deaths before you admit that what is happening is wrong
attributes.background: Open the roads stop this constant attack on drivers stop thinking we are all stupid
